guest_info.name: Michelle Berman Mikel
guest_info.title: Instagram Prospecting Coach
guest_info.specialty: Instagram prospecting for real estate agents

main_topics: Common mistakes REALTORS make on Instagram
Building authentic connections through shared interests
Structuring a weekly Instagram engagement plan
Using Instagram as a primary communication tool

problems_addressed.specific_problem: REALTORS using boilerplate content that lacks personalization
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Focus on creating personalized content that showcases your personality and interests to build authentic connections.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Difficulty in converting Instagram followers into leads
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Engage with followers by acknowledging their content, subtly mentioning your business, and asking questions to build relationships.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Lack of personal branding on Instagram
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Share personal stories and interests to create a relatable and authentic personal brand.

target_avatars.relevance: This episode offers strategies to improve Instagram engagement and lead generation.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on building authentic connections through shared interests to enhance your Instagram prospecting.

target_avatars.relevance: The episode provides advanced strategies for leveraging Instagram as a primary prospecting tool.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Use Instagram to replace traditional cold calling by building relationships through consistent engagement.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Instagram is not just a placeholder for great content. It's a platform that can actually replace a lot of the outbound prospecting that you have to do.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: This challenges the traditional view of Instagram as a passive platform.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Are you using Instagram to its full potential for prospecting?

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Acknowledge, subliminal business play, and end in a question. That's how you engage on Instagram.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable framework for engaging with followers.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Want to turn Instagram followers into leads? Here's the three-step engagement strategy.

key_tactics.tactic: Use Instagram's suggested accounts feature to find local businesses and interests.
key_tactics.context: When looking to connect with local prospects who share your interests.

key_tactics.tactic: Engage with followers by acknowledging their content, subtly mentioning your business, and asking questions.
key_tactics.context: When interacting with followers to build relationships.

key_tactics.tactic: Use Instagram to connect with leads from your CRM by finding them on the platform.
key_tactics.context: On Wednesdays, dedicate time to finding and engaging with CRM leads on Instagram.

quotable_insights: Instagram is not just a placeholder for great content. It's a platform that can actually replace a lot of the outbound prospecting that you have to do.
Acknowledge, subliminal business play, and end in a question. That's how you engage on Instagram.

resources_mentioned.name: Beyond the Method
resources_mentioned.context: Michelle's course that teaches REALTORS how to prospect on Instagram.

episode_summary: In this episode, Instagram prospecting coach Michelle Berman Mikel shares strategies for REALTORS to effectively use Instagram as a primary prospecting tool. She emphasizes the importance of building authentic connections through shared interests and provides a structured weekly engagement plan. Michelle also highlights common mistakes agents make on Instagram and offers solutions to enhance personal branding and lead conversion.
